subject: 1. Homepage Visual Improvements
body:
Reduced Create Chat button shadow for a cleaner look
Fixed spacing between header and first chat item
Centered the × button in the red end-chat circle
2. Privacy Bug Fix
Fixed critical bug where sender's tone was visible before receiver tagged it
Tone emojis now only show when both parties have tagged
3. Readable Chat Codes
Replaced: Random codes like A3B7K2 → Memorable phrases like happy-tiger
Created: Word lists (48 adjectives × 48 nouns = 2,304 combinations)
Updated: Database schema to support longer codes (varchar(20))
Enhanced: Chat avatars now show emojis instead of letters
Improved: Join screen with new placeholder and lowercase input
4. Database Fix
Fixed RLS policy that was blocking users from joining chats
Applied all migrations successfully
All features are now working correctly with the new word-based chat code system!
